name: AzureSf
help: Manage and administer Azure Service Fabric clusters.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: The resource group name.

properties.name: CertificateFile
properties.help: The existing certificate file path for the primary cluster certificate.

properties.name: CertificateOutputFolder
properties.help: The folder of the new certificate file to be created.

properties.name: CertificatePassword
properties.help: The password of the certificate file.

properties.name: CertificateSubjectName
properties.help: The subject name of the certificate to be created.

properties.name: ClusterName
properties.help: Specify the name of the cluster, if not given it will be same as resource group name.

properties.name: ClusterSize
properties.help: The number of nodes in the cluster. Default are 5 nodes.

properties.name: Os
properties.help: The Operating System of the VMs that make up the cluster.

properties.name: ParameterFile
properties.help: The path to the template parameter file.

properties.name: SecretIdentifier
properties.help: The existing Azure key vault secret URL.

properties.name: TemplateFile
properties.help: The path to the template file.

properties.name: VaultName
properties.help: Azure key vault name, it not given it will be the cluster resource group name.

properties.name: VaultResourceGroup
properties.help: Key vault resource group name,if not given it will be cluster resource group name.

properties.name: VmPassword
properties.help: The password of the Vm.

properties.name: VmSku
properties.help: The Vm Sku.

properties.name: VmUserName
properties.help: The user name for logging to Vm. Default will be adminuser.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: The resource group name.

properties.name: ClusterName
properties.help: Specify the name of the cluster, if not given it will be same as resource group name.

properties.help: The subject name of the certificate to be created.

properties.help: The existing Azure key vault secret URL.

properties.name: VaultName

properties.help: Key vault resource group name,if not given it will be cluster resource group name.

properties.name: ClusterName
properties.help: Specify the name of the cluster, if not given it will be same as resource group name.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: The resource group name.

properties.name: AdminClientThumbprints
properties.help: Client certificate thumbprint that only has admin permission.

properties.name: CertificateCommonName
properties.help: Client certificate common name.

properties.name: CertificateIssuerThumbprint
properties.help: Client certificate issuer thumbprint.

properties.name: ClientCertificateCommonNames
properties.help: JSON encoded parameters configuration. Use @{file} to load from a file. For example: [{"isAdmin":true, "certificateCommonName": "test.com", "certificateIssuerThumbprint": "22B4AE296B504E512DF880A77A2CAE20200FF922"}].

properties.name: IsAdmin
properties.help: Client authentication type.

properties.name: ReadonlyClientThumbprints
properties.help: Space-separated list of client certificate thumbprint that has read only permission.

properties.name: Thumbprint
properties.help: Client certificate thumbprint.

properties.name: ClusterName
properties.help: Specify the name of the cluster, if not given it will be same as resource group name.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: The resource group name.

properties.name: CertificateCommonName
properties.help: Client certificate common name.

properties.name: CertificateIssuerThumbprint
properties.help: Client certificate issuer thumbprint.

properties.name: ClientCertificateCommonNames
properties.help: JSON encoded parameters configuration. Use @{file} to load from a file. For example: [{"certificateCommonName": "test.com","certificateIssuerThumbprint": "22B4AE296B504E512DF880A77A2CAE20200FF922"}].

properties.name: Thumbprints
properties.help: A single or Space-separated list of client certificate thumbprint(s) to be remove.

properties.name: ClusterName
properties.help: Specify the name of the cluster, if not given it will be same as resource group name.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: The resource group name.

properties.help: Cluster upgrade mode.

properties.name: Version
properties.help: Cluster code version.

properties.help: Specify the name of the cluster, if not given it will be same as resource group name.

properties.help: JSON encoded parameters configuration. Use @{file} to load from a file. For example: [{"section": "NamingService","parameter": "MaxOperationTimeout","value": 1000},{"section": "MaxFileOperationTimeout","parameter": "Max2","value": 1000].

properties.help: Specify the value.
